title: AI-Powered Physiotherapy Chatbot
description: An intelligent query system using fine-tuned PubMedBERT for physiotherapy-related questions. Features secure login and intelligent preprocessing.

title: NoCodeML Tool
description: A user-friendly tool that allows users to upload CSV files, select ML models, and train them without writing code. Supports both regression and classification tasks.

title: Project H2O
description: An ML-based water quality analyzer focused on sustainability and health. Helps in monitoring and analyzing water quality parameters.

title: Automatic Door Locking System
description: An IoT-based smartphone-controlled smart lock system for enhanced home security.
